func.name: takePicture

param.name: onComplete
param.comment: callback that will recieve the path when a picture is created

param.name: onCancel
param.comment: callback that is called when the user cancels the photo

param.name: onError
param.comment: callback that is called if an error occurs

func.details: Invoke the native camera application and register the callback method to be invoke with path to the picture when becomes available.

func.name: takeVideo

param.name: onComplete
param.comment: callback that will recieve the path when a video is created

param.name: onCancel
param.comment: callback that is called when the user cancels the video

param.name: onError
param.comment: callback that is called if an error occurs

func.details: Invoke the native camera application and register the callback method to be invoke with path to the video when becomes available.

func.name: close
func.comment: Closes the camera or video recorder application if it is in the foreground
func.details: Closes the camera or video recorder application if it is in the foreground.

object.name: onComplete
object.comment: Interface to provide path to a picture or video taken by camera.

param.name: path
param.comment: The path to the last captured media item (picture, sound, video)

object.details: This interface must be available for you to receive a path to a picture or video taken by the camera.

object.name: onCancel
object.comment: called when the user cancels the operation
object.details: This interface is used when the user cancels the operation

object.name: onError
object.details: This interface is used when an error occurs
